channel.title: Home on Aravind Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Aravind Kumar

item.title: Profile
item.description: Experience # Oct ‘21 - Present Research Fellow in Computational Neuroscience University of Birmingham, UK Project: Seizures and the Brain: Role of Perturbed Dynamic Networks Advisor: Prof.

item.title: Research
item.description: I hold a PhD in Applied Mechanics from the Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai, India, with my thesis focussing on enhancing the power obtained from piezoelectric energy harvesters.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I am Aravind, an engineer, applied mathematician, neuroscientist, and above all, a curious individual by heart.
